company_description: Hopin is a virtual events platform that enables organizations to create and host online events, conferences, and meetings with interactive features and networking opportunities.
heritage: Australian born, Lebanes father, Syrian-Armenian mother
seed_investors: Seedcamp, Northzone, Remote First Capital, Slack Fund, Tapestry VC
